item.title: The Ultimate List of Youtube Programming Channels
item.description: Here are the Youtube channels I subscribe and recommend. They are in no particular order. Computer History Museum I’m an old school programmer and this fits my taste perfectly well. Especially check out the Oral Histories section where they have in-depth interviews with the industry legends from top IT companies. Confreaks Mainly about Ruby conference videos recordings, even though I don’t know Ruby I still find some of their videos extremely helpful.
